Articles.Content:
Hi, I wonder if anyone can help please:

I've just installed Infernal Robotics v3.0.7. All the parts are available to build with, but the button to bring up the GUI, which as far as I can tell should appear down the bottom right hand corner isn't there so I have no way of controlling the parts (see picture below). Has anyone else come across this before? I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling several different times from several different sources.

Other mods installed include:

  • MechJeb2
  • Tweakscale
  • MK4 Spaceplane
  • Stockalike Station Parts Redux

Thanks

Update on this: I tried deleting and reinstalling the mod a couple more times. I did get the button for the GUI to show up once, but the next time I loaded the game it had gone again - I don't think I changed anything in the Game Data folder, so no idea what that's about.

 

Any help greatly appreciated!
